name: Monster Cluster
description:
PLEASE VOTE FOR THIS GAME : https://lpgmahieu.typeform.com/to/pvKKoB

Chicago, 1920, the dreadfull wars between mafias and police force is raging. During a robbery, your team found a unholy strange artefact. The artefact turn all of you in monsters! And all of you have the power to rise monster mobster to serve your interests.

Your old friends became your rivals. After an epic fight, your mafia was obliterated and you must recompose your force. But, hey, you are THE necromobster, and nothing is impossible for you.

In this single player game, you will need to literrally recreate your gang pieces by pieces, and send them to multiples missions and expand your notoriety.
